title: Black and Tan Short Haired Chihuahua in Chest Pocket T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

If you are a proud shorthaired Chihuahua mom or dad, this funny tee shirt featuring a cute little puppy coming out of the breast-pocket is definitely for you! And of course, this tshirt also can be a great gift idea for that special dog lover in your life!

The original image of a Chiwawa pup was specially designed by Stonemask Studio for the true fans of this amazing tiny dog breed. Wear this witty tee shirt everywhere you go, isn't this the perfect way to share your crazy love for Chihuahuas with the world?
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: PLEASE, PAY ATTENTION that the pocket is not real but just a printed image.
